alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Cobb; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Cherokee, northeastern Cobb and north central Fulton Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sandy Plains, or near Mountain Park, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marietta, Canton, Mountain Park, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Alpharetta, Milton, Kennesaw, Woodstock, Holly Springs, Mount Bethel, Hickory Flat, Kellogg Creek, Sandy Plains, Hobgood Park, Union Hill, White Water Park, Sweat Mountain, Oak Grove and Kennesaw State University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
